name: ClawBrain
description: Persistent semantic memory. Store text, search by meaning, recall across sessions.

composePath.description: Path to the directory containing docker-compose.yml. If omitted, docker compose uses its default project discovery.

serviceName.description: Docker Compose service name for the clawbrain container. Defaults to 'clawbrain'.

binaryPath.description: Direct path to the clawbrain binary. When set, skips Docker and calls the binary directly. Useful for CI or host-installed setups.
